name: PoPoLoCrois Monogatari
storyline: The main character is the prince of the Popolocrois kingdom, Pietro. PoLoCRoIS Monogatari starts at the night of Pietro's 10th birthday, when he learns that his mother, who he thought was long dead, was found in a coma. Pietro sets out into a journey along with the apprentice forest witch Narcia to save his mother's soul from the underworld.
summary: The first entry in the PoPoLoCrois franchise, a series of tactical RPGs developped by Sony.
